TypeSignature.Value: type INoCopySpan = interface interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable
public interface INoCopySpan : Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, IDisposable, Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable
.class public interface auto ansi abstract INoCopySpan implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: This interface should be added to a span object that should not be copied into a new Spanned when performing a slice or copy operation on the original Spanned it was placed in.
